name: Scrabble
description:
Many Ways to Play - Play with friends in person, online, or add virtual opponents. Virtual opponents range from easy to very difficult to beat, and will respond to the player’s actions and strategies over time, allowing players to either engage in casual fun or play with a real challenge.
Exciting Matches and Challenges - For the first time on consoles, Scrabble can be played competitively against players from all over the world in an engaging, seamless multiplayer experience. Players will be matched against other players of similar skill and try to prove who is better as they rank up across new multiplayer modes.
Track Your Progress - Scrabble features a player card that tracks multiple stats for the player across both solo and multiplayer experiences. All major stats are shown on the Scrabble Leaderboards, allowing players to see how they stack up against the community!

1-4 players
1080p HD Video Output
Offline Play Enabled
